## Applies To ##
* Ruby
## Solution Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby
require 'etc' if not ARGV.length == 2 puts "Usage: #{$0} [username] [group name]" exit end
def drop_privileges(user, primary_group, extra_groups=nil) if not Process::Sys.geteuid == 0 return end uid = Etc.getpwnam(user).uid gid = Etc.getgrnam(primary_group).gid
Process.groups = [gid] if not extra_groups == nil extra_groups do |gr| Process.groups |= Etc.getgrnam(gr).gid end end Process::Sys.setgid(gid) Process::Sys.setuid(uid) end
begin drop_privileges(ARGV[0], ARGV[1]) rescue Errno::EPERM, Errno::EAGAIN => err puts "Error: Unable to successfully drop privileges." exit end
until false puts "Sleeping" sleep 1 end ~~~~
